item.title: TLS with certbot
item.description: TLS Let’s Encrypted certbot certbot 설치 PIP로 설치 Package Management로 설치 Enable the universe repository sudo apt-get install software-properties-common sudo add-apt-repository universe sudo apt-get update Install certbot sudo apt install certbot certbot certonly --manual \ --preferred-challengers=dns \ --email jupil.hwang@gmail.com \ --server https://acme-v02.api.letsencrypt.org/directory \ --agress-tos \ -d *.harbor.lgvmw01.local
